channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump’s tariffs are unfair to most Americans. Here’s how they could actually be beneficial.
item.description: Instead of blanket tariffs, an ethical policy shows a clear and justifiable need for protection.

item.title: My wife and I are in our late 60s. Do I sell stocks to pay our $30,000 credit-card debt — or do it gradually over 3 years?
item.description: “We have around $375,000 in investments in mutual funds and stocks with Morgan Stanley.”

item.title: My wife and I have $7,000 a month in pensions and Social Security, plus $140,000 cash. Can we afford to retire?
item.description: “My wife of 20 years is a Japanese national and lives in the U.S. as a permanent resident.”

item.title: What’s in your 401(k)? Why boomers and Gen X really need to know.
item.description: Your target-date fund might have the wrong mix for you, and new alternatives could be risky.

item.title: How these Big Tech stocks are getting a boost from this clean-energy credit
item.description: Amazon.com, Alphabet, Meta Platforms and Microsoft are just a few tech giants making use of carbon credits.

item.title: The tech sector still has legs in the second half, and Deepwater's Gene Munster likes these names
item.description: "We're in the camp that AI is going to measurably surprise to the upside this year," Munster told CNBC Pro in an interview.

item.title: Gen Z and millennials embrace health and wellness. These stocks could benefit
item.description: Bank of America credit card data shows Gen Z and millennials are spending more on health and wellness.

item.title: Re-risking your portfolio: Investor John Davi's picks for the second half of 2025
item.description: Davi advises investors to look away from popular ETFs such as SPY and VOO and instead at ETFs in industrials, energy, real estate and fixed income.

item.title: This semiconductor stock could have more room to run after a strong first half, says UBS
item.description: Shares have gained more than 11% so far in 2025.

item.title: Defense tech stocks have surged – and analysts say these names have higher to go
item.description: Even as lawmakers try to be strategic about spending, they want a 12% increase in the defense budget. Defense tech stocks are poised to benefit, analy...
